data.description:
Stabby is an intense, multiplayer assassination style game in VR. Players use immersive controls to STAB EVERYTHING. Want to scale buildings and parkour across the city? STAB. Reveal your targets, then drop from rooftops to eliminate them? STAB. Up to 6 players in a lobby can compete to see who’s the best STABBER, with fully articulated avatars they can customize to their liking. 

In Stabby you’ll find : 

- 5 Singleplayer Challenge Levels to test the players’ abilities (to STAB) as well as train them to become more effective in multiplayer gameplay (AND STABBING).
- Each level has a 3-star rating system based on the time it took to complete, encouraging quick, decisive thinking (AND STABBING) as well as replaying levels to attain better times and rewards.
- Customizable Player Avatars and Weapons. Show off your gear in Multiplayer and earn bragging rights with exclusive skins only available to the most skilled players (THAT CAN STAB THE BEST). 
- 3 Multiplayer Game Modes, each one with a different playstyle encouraging players to adapt on the fly. Classic, King of the Hill, and Stab Tag. (HINT, THEY ALL INVOLVE STABBING)
- Intense, physics driven gameplay and movement mechanics (AND STABBING). Easy to pick up, but fun to master, Stabby’s robust movement mechanics are driven by realistic physics encouraging players to experiment and think creatively to achieve their goal (WHICH IS TO STAB).
